# SQL With

With statements are also called Common Table Expressions or CTEs.
Why should we CTEs instead of views or derived tables (from sub-queries)?

- CTE Temporary, view permanent
- readable, literate sql
- nesting
- Recursion


They are two types of CTEs.

1. Ordinary
2. Recursive
